website_summaries.verdict: Made from hand-blown glass, unique styling, and clear, unblemished crystal, the Venero wine decanter holds a 750 milliliter bottle of wine at the perfect width for softening tannins in wine, and can also be used to open flavors in ports, and whiskeys. This elegant item is an attractive serving vessel for any liquor, cocktails, juices, or punch.
pros: Lifetime warranty, clear hand-blown crystal decanter and stopper, solid and functional
cons: Round glass stopper is more decorative than functional and could break if dropped on a hard surface (or roll away)
Can be tricky to clean if used for thicker juices or punches

customer_reviews.title: looks fabulous and love the glass stopper
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this decanter. Especially like the glass stopper - comes in handy when you have wine left
customer_reviews.author: Vina Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet nice looking decanter
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet nice looking decanter. I am impressed with the quality of the glass. Only thing I wish it had was different lid than a big ball as sometime it may be hard not to drop it when some one is drunk and serving wine or whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Chapagai

customer_reviews.title: Smoked cocktails: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Using primarily for smoking cocktails. Sold in well padded container. No obvious flaws. Provides huge surface area to spirits. Angled spout helps with pouring, and is worthwhile even if it lets a bit of smoke escape around the glass stopper. Instructions warn against keeping spirits in decanter for extended period.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: So good I purchased again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 years ago for my parents and they used it often. One day while cleaning a heavy bottle fell and hit the decanter at just the right spot and cracked it. My parents were crushed. So I ordered it again for them. They are very pleased with the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: jackieoh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decanter, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Well done design, very nice quality and I love the spherical glass ball capper. You cannot go wrong with this decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Tire Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Drink red wine everyday 😃
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely pleased with our purchase ! It is a beautiful decanter and aerator and adds elegance to any table. One must be careful when placing the crystal ball back on decanter to prevent chipping. It was packaged perfectly and arrived in a very timely manner, even given the Holidays. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Bill Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Clear flawless glass and heavy ball stopper. Nice touch that they add instructions for use for different wines and liquors. Very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: First Lewie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality - won't last long
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this decanter and it did what it was supposed to, open up wine so it tastes better. However I think the glass must be super thin, because I was just washing it one day and it just cracked out of nowhere. Just warm water filling it up did the trick. I'd avoid this product and go a more durable option.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Erickson

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Showed up on time. Wrapping was great for the quality of glass. It is super heavy and the marble that sits on top is perfect. I filled this up with red wine and it’s been a definitely eye catcher for every person strolling through my kitchen. Definitely appreciated and highly recommended. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: No headline until it is given .
customer_reviews.text: Hi -- The decanter arrived safely. It is a Christmas gift for my son so I do not yet know if he likes it etc so hard for me to review..I think it is beautiful. Will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decanter
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful decanter with modern-looking lines.....just what I was in search of. I would not hesitate to purchase another one if I need if.
customer_reviews.author: mtnlover

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: this thing sucks. Never dries. I have a special drying rack for it and it stays wet. Don't waste ur money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works grea
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and just rinse it out to clean. I wish there was a holder to put the cool glass sphere when its not on top of the decanter.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate it’s durability since I have not had any incidents luckily. The decanter is a great addition to our kitchen, my girlfriend loved it. It looks wonderful when filled with a dark red. Obviously gratful for the companies pricing and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: steven b

customer_reviews.title: Stay away,  cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap glass and flimsy. Wine enthusiast decanter or Ravenscroft ones are much better. This feels like a $20 one instead. Please stay away. The customer service sucks to return and they said I'd they could give me 20%off instead of returning it. Horrible
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: This is the decanter !
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding decanter for the price ! You can’t go wrong as this is top quality and great looking .
customer_reviews.author: Larry Birum

customer_reviews.title: CAME RIGHT ON TIME
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, it's a gift so I'm hoping that my son and daughter in law will like it as much as I do. If for some reason they don't, I will not be sending it back, I'm keeping it for my self. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great decater!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. It's very attractive and due to it's shape, has plenty of room to swirl to further aerate the decanted wine. The ball for the top is a plus. My husband is the wine drinker, and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Great Decanter. The little glass ball really adds a nice touch to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Baldisserotto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my broken decanter. Item has some heft and looks beautiful yet simple. Arrived in very nice packaging and in expected new condition.
customer_reviews.author: GDMHB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Venero Wine Decanter as a gift for a friend. She absolutely loved it. The decanter is very elegant and adds a great taste to the wine. I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra H

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is Great for the price! We loved it
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift, the recipient loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Venero Wine Aerator Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful decanter, easy transaction, prompt delivery. Maintenance and use instructions were of interest. I'm pleased with this product so much I'm purchasing another for my summer residence. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mills

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!! It is PERFECT! Beautiful, solid and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Himes-Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The decanter was a present for my boss....and it was a great gift. Fast shipping and beautiful decanter, my boss was very happy
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this decanter! Really let’s the wine breathe. Looks really pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: C Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a co-worker. Beauuuutiful piece! So much bigger than I expected too. Very solid, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeHaven

customer_reviews.title: Chipped on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for someone, and they recently decided to use it. It’s really pretty, but the lip of the decanter had a chip on unboxing. I’m disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hirashiki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vendor
customer_reviews.text: The product came as promised and with great care and instructions for great use. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging material. Arrived in perfect shape. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Darkow

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Decanter-Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This decanter exceeded my expectations. I have been searching for a nice crystal decanter with a wide base and this works perfectly. It is very attractive to leave out on a table when entertaining guests. Highly recommend this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WebbTX

customer_reviews.title: A very visible bubble
customer_reviews.text: Not so satisfied. Mine has a visible bubble on the neck. I went with this Venero decanter because it was the only one with 5 stars and none complaining about bubbles (like most of the others decanters sold by Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: gianluca di stefano

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the quality control?!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a chiped edge on the spout and a defect in the neck, the ball also has a chip in it!!
customer_reviews.author: PrasRev

customer_reviews.title: A work of Art made from the Heart
customer_reviews.text: This masterfully crafted work of art comes from what I've learnt recently to be from a small family-run startup which makes it all the more beautiful. Elegantly, this fragile "looking" yet solid construct decanter comes with thick crystal walls and a solid crystal ball for the icing. It has proven it's worthiness by making it's way across the seven seas (kind of) from JFK, New York to KUL, Malaysia completely unscathed and in pristine condition as if it were just a mere hop and a skip away. In addition, the crafters of this majestic creature have enclosed a care guide that is suitable for both the beginners and experienced alike.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lye

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter
customer_reviews.text: Great aerator, stylish and steady on a table. I just wish that the styrofoam packaging and box were square so I could only remove a top part to put this decanter back into the box. Pulling the whole thing out made crystal ball stopper fall out. If you don't intend to store it in the box disregard this rant.
customer_reviews.author: Seth J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works really well. I saw others had problems pouring from it - wow talk about picky. Just hold the thing differently and you can pour the last drop out.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: nice, pretty, works to air out wine, a nice little investment and works good
customer_reviews.author: Fire2300

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it costs more than it does.
customer_reviews.text: My family loved this and keep it in the China cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Demarest

customer_reviews.title: Wine Carafe
customer_reviews.text: Great conversation piece. Serves its purpose. Will buy as gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Sleek style, quality, great size for optimal aeration
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son & his fiancée who are developing a palate for red wine. They loved it, especially the glass ball! A full standard bottle doesn’t fill the bottom..(which is a good thing)!
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the wine rack we just built, it was the perfect decanter for the space we provided.
customer_reviews.author: Caitiepat

customer_reviews.title: best decanter!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little surprised that it arrived in good shape. But very nice quality decanter. Looks very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Jmac

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality decanter! Very pretty to set out for dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Elegant...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, solid build and looks elegant on my sideboard. The wide base really improves any quality of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark
